com.openfeint.api.resource
Class Score

java.lang.Object
  com.openfeint.internal.resource.Resource
      com.openfeint.api.resource.Score

public class Score
extends com.openfeint.internal.resource.Resource

The resource class that represents a Score posted to OpenFeint. This class is used to post high scores. The list of current high scores for a given Leaderboard is contained in its highScores field.

Nested Class Summary
static class Score.BlobDownloadedDelegate
          A delegate class you can install to be notified when the user downloads a blob from the Feint Dashboard.
static class Score.DownloadBlobCB
          A callback class you can extend for calling Score.downloadBlob().

Field Detail

user

public User user
The User who posted this score.

score

public long score
The numeric value of the score.

rank

public int rank
Approximate rank in the Leaderboard.

leaderboardId

public int leaderboardId
The resource ID of the Leaderboard that this score came from.

displayText

public java.lang.String displayText
The text displayed on the leaderboard. If this is empty or null, the text displayed on the leaderboard will be this.score.

customData

public java.lang.String customData
A bit of custom data you can attach to a Score before submission, and ideally get it back later. This field is currently unsupported.

latitude

public double latitude
The submitting User's latitude at the time they submitted this score.

longitude

public double longitude
The submitting User's longitude at the time they submitted this score.

blob

public byte[] blob
A blob of data associated with this score. You can use this field to store replays associated with the high score, among other things. If you set this before calling submitTo(), this blob will be uploaded to the server. However, it is not downloaded by default - you need to call downloadBlob() if you want to retrieve the data. You can tell if a score has a blob to download by calling the hasBlob() method, regardless of whether the blob has been downloaded yet.

Constructor Detail

Score

public Score(long score)
When posting a score to a Leaderboard, use this constructor. No other fields need be filled out before calling submitTo(Leaderboard).

Parameters:
score - The user's score.

Score

public Score(long score,
             java.lang.String displayText)
If you will be posting a score to a Leaderboard and you want to have the Leaderboard display a string other than just the numeric score, use this constructor. No other fields need be filled out before calling submitTo(Leaderboard).

Parameters:
score - The user's score. (Ranking is calculated using this value!)
displayText - The string that should show on the leaderboard, if desired to be different than score.

Score

public Score()
This constructor is for use by the parser only.

Method Detail

hasBlob

public boolean hasBlob()
This method can be called to determine whether a Score object retrieved from a Leaderboard method has a blob available for downloading. If it's true, you can call downloadBlob() to retrieve the blob, and store it in the blob member variable.

Returns:
whether this Score has an associated blob that can be downloaded.

submitTo

public void submitTo(Leaderboard leaderboard,
                     Score.SubmitToCB cb)
Call this method to submit a Score you created to a given Leaderboard. For example, to submit a local user score of 123 to the Leaderboard with the resource ID 456, and report to the SubmitToCB object cb, you would do: 
new Score(123).submitTo(new Leaderboard("456"), cb);

Parameters:
cb - The callback object that will be notified on request completion.

submitToFromOffline

public void submitToFromOffline(Leaderboard leaderboard,
                                java.lang.String timestamp,
                                Score.SubmitToCB cb)
This method is used internally by OpenFeint, you shouldn't need to call this.

public void downloadBlob(Score.DownloadBlobCB cb)

Installs a delegate as the handler to use when the user downloads a blob from the Feint Dashboard.

delegate -

getResourceClass

public static com.openfeint.internal.resource.ResourceClass getResourceClass()
This method is used internally by OpenFeint.
